title: My loading screen bugs out
body:
Hi, I just reset my computer to factory settings and now I have a sort of bug after reinstalling the client.

I log in and enter queue, I make it all the way through lobby and then in loading screen none of the champions seem to load and the blue circle doesn't move. 

However, if I ctrl-esc I can see a brief image of the champions and their loading progress! If I re-enter I can see this again for a quarter-second again before my screen goes completely black. 

So my game is being loaded, but for some reason I can't see it or participate. If anybody knows the solution or cause to this, I would be eternally grateful!

replies.body:
It sounds like your network is having a hard time making a connection to our game servers. When this happens it can cause the loading screen to look black, since it can't grab the info it's supposed to display from our servers. Look over our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you're keeping a stable connection through the whole game.

Hit me up if you have any questions!
